text: The 2008–09 Montreal Canadiens season is their 99th season of play and 91st in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == == Playoffs == The Canadiens lost to the Boston Bruins in the Conference Quarter-Finals no games to 4. ==References== Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2008 in Canada Category:2009 in Canada
title: 2008–09 Montreal Canadiens season
